experiences.title: Product Associate
experiences.subtitle: Anlage Infotech
workDescription: Managing a few modules of select 10x product working closely with cross‑functional teams such as engineering, design, and data science to develop and bring to market new features within specified deadlines.
Maintaining PRDs of features under development throughout the product life cycle.
Gathering and analyzing data to extrapolate metrics for product performance.
Creating User stories and User flows for client side product modules using figma.
Making Test cases and other testing documents for end‑point‑API’s as well as other complex sub systems related to intelligent candidate recommendation system.
Performing Market surveys and feasibility studies to help the management decide on new additions to the product

experiences.title: Business Analyst
experiences.subtitle: Sciffer Anlytics
workDescription: Made Business requirements Document for Reflexion.AI
Conducted User acceptance testing of various modules as well as tested end points of crucial api’s on postman.
Made python scripts using web sockets for automated testing of User Interface for music scheduler made for a entertainment industry client

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: SL Consultancy Services
workDescription: Underwent 3 months of training after which I was inducted in as a software developer on a workflow management project for a Accounting firm.
Worked on the customer data storage and handling as well as the automated report generation module.
Backend development Mainly dealt with python and JavaScript using frameworks such as Node js, django and streamlit.
Frontend was made using react, HAML,HTML and CSS.
Libraries such as D3.js and Charts.js amongst others were used for making dashboards related to report generation
